json.text: Using mysteriously dark, and somewhat mysterious energies, I can now deal damage with the
force of dark and shadow of life
The raw power of darkness and mystery seems reasonably effective at causing harm, of course... plus I've noticed that
the darkness hungers for those who are close to death, heavily amplifying the damage

Water flows so smoothly in nature. With just some magic, water can be turned into a controlled force, too.
By fusing concepts in a stranger manner, I have managed to form water to flow, rigidly? This is a disaster. However, by launching this beautiful disaster at whatever I want, I can
cause them to take damage
Just a splash of mild pain at first, however this water
reacts and flows to to any strange magic or fluid on a target, causing the damage to increase dramatically
Strange effects seem to be ones I have
not been able to replicate alchemically, like Conduit Power or seemingly do not exist naturally.
I can concentrate my raw fury and feelings of agony into magic. This is how I deal with problems. I just so happen to be able to
direct this at my enemies, causing them to feel the pain, increasing based on how hurt I am, plus extra flat damage if I am painfully damaged
I need to actually be in a state of pain...
any health above 20 will cause the damage to decrease rather than increase
I am feeling quite deliciously evil today, aren't I? Yes, of course. I shall
devour baby animals to sate my hunger
Yes, quite a fancy meal, delicious. Perfect idea.
This or I could do literally any other action that would benefit me more, such as read a book.
Demons win again.
I am able to manipulate the emotions of my enemies to
make them not care about targeting anything
They will instead choose to sit and do nothing, ignoring
any target they would normally want to chase
By bending light around me, I become harder to hit.
Most types of damage will have a chance of not affecting me at all

If everything had the ability to seemingly dodge even when I throw a fireball 200 km/h at their face, that certainly would be miserable.
I sure am glad I am one of the few who can perform this... probably. Hopefully.
Binding my wounds is not effective when I am constantly flying through the air and/or teleporting everywhere. I have created a
similar regenerative effect; though this is a very slow and weak one, I am freely able to move without disrupting the effect
Now, there are some restorative benefits beyond just that...
I also receive more healing while I am under the effect.
I want to reach further. Swing a blade from a great distance, place blocks at a huge range, perhaps even reach the top shelf.
Out of all of the methods, such as perhaps augmenting my reach with kinetic spells... I have decided to make my arms really, really long. I'm pretty smart.
I can reach further with these, of course
I can compress and move raw force within my muscles, perfectly controlling them like a machine, allowing me to
have much more force and accuracy in my ranged attacks for the short period I can handle this
My arrows, tridents and the like shall fly at incredible speeds using the raw power of musclemancy, arrows especially become painfully strong, like me.
The effect lasts for 1 shot from arrow based weapons and lasts for the entire duration for thrown weapons.
I can use REAL LIGHTNING to cause me to attack faster. This is how energy works.
The burst of attack speed affects melee and ranged attacks, and the burst does not last long
